---

# aap_eda_credential_type (Data Source)

Gets an existing EDA Credential Type. Either id or name must be specified.


## Example Usage

### Look up by name

```terraform
data "aap_eda_credential_type" "example" {
  name = "my-credential-type"
}
```

### Look up by ID

```terraform
data "aap_eda_credential_type" "example" {
  id = 42
}
```


<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) EDA Credential Type id. Either id or name must be specified.
- `name` (String) Name of the EDA Credential Type. Either id or name must be specified.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the EDA Credential Type
- `injectors` (String) Injector configuration for the credential type as a JSON string
- `inputs` (String) Input schema for the credential type as a JSON string
